data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Guayanilla hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guayanilla, Puerto Rico
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Guayanilla. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Guayanilla.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Guayanilla to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Guayanilla
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Guayanilla, Guayanilla, Puerto Rico.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Guayanilla, Puerto Rico. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: There are 17,700 people living in the state of Guayanilla. Only about 5,755 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guayanilla, Puerto Rico has a population of 17,700.

We estimate Guayanilla has 5,755 people who might know Jesus, 10,980 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 965 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Guayanilla do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.
